      class  SchemaChangeListenerBase
      Convenience class for listener implementations that that don't need to override all methods (all methods in this class are empty).

    • Uses of SchemaChangeListener in com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.session

      Methods in com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.session that return SchemaChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SchemaChangeListener ProgrammaticArguments.getSchemaChangeListener() 
      Methods in com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.session with parameters of type SchemaChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProgrammaticArguments.Builder ProgrammaticArguments.Builder.addSchemaChangeListener(SchemaChangeListener schemaChangeListener) 
      SelfT SessionBuilder.addSchemaChangeListener(SchemaChangeListener schemaChangeListener)
      Registers a schema change listener to use with the session, without removing previously-registered listeners.
      protected DriverContext SessionBuilder.buildContext(DriverConfigLoader configLoader, List<TypeCodec<?>> typeCodecs, NodeStateListener nodeStateListener, SchemaChangeListener schemaChangeListener, RequestTracker requestTracker, Map<String,String> localDatacenters, Map<String,Predicate<Node>> nodeFilters, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Deprecated. 
      this method only exists for backward compatibility (if a subclass written for driver 4.1.0 returns a non-null result, that value will be used). Please override SessionBuilder.buildContext(DriverConfigLoader, ProgrammaticArguments) instead.
      ProgrammaticArguments.Builder ProgrammaticArguments.Builder.withSchemaChangeListener(SchemaChangeListener schemaChangeListener) 
      SelfT SessionBuilder.withSchemaChangeListener(SchemaChangeListener schemaChangeListener)
      Registers a schema change listener to use with the session.
